title: Naomi ult rename
body: Hey Rito Dorito and fellow players I have noticed that Rito has over looked one of the greatest opportunitys they had to improve the game. When looking over {{champion:267}} Nami I noticed that her ult had been called tidal wave. But did you know that another name for a tidal wave is a tsunami!!!!! So what I propose is that Rito changes the ult name to Tsu-Nami!!! Because who doesn't love a good pun aye? Also anyone else feel that teemo{{champion:17}}  should have the damage on his shrooms buffed? Please comment if you agree. Thank you summoners and long live the mighty Veigar! {{champion:45}}

replies.body: God dammit. Please ignore title fail my iPad auto corrected and I didn't notice. And I can't edit the title
